# Acme Widget Optimizer

## Problem Statement

Small-business owners spend an average of **3.2 hours per week** manually tuning widget parameters.

## Objective

Build an automated widget-optimization service that reduces manual tuning time by 80%.

## Success Metrics

| Metric | Baseline | Target |
|--------|----------|--------|
| Manual tuning hours / week | 3.2 h | 0.6 h |
| Parameter error rate | 18% | < 5% |

## Risks

1. Model accuracy
2. Data quality
3. Compliance
audience: VP of Product and engineering leads
